reporter_caption.center: IN RE PETITION OF NEW ENGLAND TEL. AND TELEGRAPH COMPANY, 138 Vt. 655 (1980)

caption.center: IN RE PETITION OF NEW ENGLAND TELEPHONE AND TELEGRAPH COMPANY for an

opinion.opinion_text: New England Telephone and Telegraph Company's application for a stay of the final order of the Public Service Board dated August 27, 1980, is denied.
